text: I brainstormed three options for the design and parked them to compare later.
I felt small in that conversation and didn’t speak up when I disagreed.
I published the post and the response validated my message.
I went for a walk at lunch and planned the rest of the afternoon.
I hesitated to share my idea in class and then someone else said it first.
I woke up early, finished deep work, and protected my energy all day.
I stood tall during the presentation and the Q&A felt natural.
The meeting went fine. I answered questions and took notes for follow‑ups.
My voice shook during the call; I wish I could start over.
I finished the first pass of edits without changing the structure yet.
